content: {{knowledge objective |Identifiant=OIC-075-17-A |Item_parent=Smoking addiction |Item_parent_short=Smoking addiction |Rank=A |Title=Knowing the epidemiology of passive smoking, the main concepts of excess risk |Description=None |Rubric=Epidemiology |Contributors= |Order=17}} Non-psychiatric medical complications related to '''passive intoxication'''' * Ischaemic heart disease * Bronchopulmonary cancer * Coronary artery disease * Otitis and asthma in children * Bronchitis

properties.question: Which of the following is NOT a non-psychiatric medical complication related to passive smoking?
